synopsis.text: Since the untimely death of his parents, Hiro Hiyorimi and his sister have been living separate lives. When Hiro receives an invitation from his sister to live with her in a new city, he eagerly accepts, only to meet an unfortunate end before they can reunite. In a twist of fate, Hiro is resurrected to serve as a loyal guardian to a stunning princess hailing from the Monster Realm, who coincidentally employs his sister as a maid. As the princess is a contender for the throne, Hiro must shield her from the relentless onslaught of monstrous adversaries, even if it means sacrificing his own life time and time again. Prepare for a thrilling rollercoaster ride filled with suspense, action, and a touch of the supernatural in this enthralling anime adaptation of Mitsunaga Yasunori's manga.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
